data.trans: (Thuộc về) Tính tự giác của ai
data.trans_hint: Nếu mọi người tự giác chăm sóc môi trường sống của chính mình, thế giới sẽ là một nơi tốt đẹp hơn nhiều.
data.en_hint: If everyone takes care of the living environment of their own accord, the world will be a much better place.
data.content_game_1: If everyone takes care of the living environment of their own accord, the world will be a much better place.
data.answer_en_hint: If everyone takes care of the living environment of their own accord, the world will be a much better place.

data.trans_hint: Ngày nay, sống xanh là một trong những xu hướng phổ biến nhất.
data.en_hint: Nowadays, being green is one of the most popular trends.
data.content_game_1: Nowadays, being green is one of the most popular trends.
data.answer_en_hint: Nowadays, being green is one of the most popular trends.

data.trans_hint: Một trong những cách để giảm thiểu ô nhiễm là giảm lượng chất thải độc hại mà một công ty có thể thải ra môi trường.
data.en_hint: One of the ways to reduce pollution is to reduce the amount of toxic waste that a company can release into the environment.
data.content_game_1: One of the ways to reduce pollution is to reduce the amount of toxic waste that a company can release into the environment.
data.answer_en_hint: One of the ways to reduce pollution is to reduce the amount of toxic waste that a company can release into the environment.

data.trans_hint: Quản lý khuyến khích chúng tôi tham gia vào dự án với những món tiền thưởng hậu hĩnh.
data.en_hint: Our manager incentivised us to get involved in the project with handsome bonuses.
data.content_game_1: Our manager incentivised us to get involved in the project with handsome bonuses.
data.answer_en_hint: Our manager incentivised us to get involved in the project with handsome bonuses.

data.trans_hint: Nếu chúng ta không coi trọng môi trường, thế hệ tiếp theo của chúng ta sẽ phải gánh thêm gánh nặng của việc giải quyết ô nhiễm trong tương lai.
data.en_hint: If we don't take the environment seriously, our next generation will need to take on the burden of solving pollution in the future.
data.content_game_1: If we don't take the environment seriously, our next generation will need to take on the burden of solving pollution in the future.
data.answer_en_hint: If we don't take the environment seriously, our next generation will need to take on the burden of solving pollution in the future.

data.trans_hint: Chúng ta cần thay đổi lối sống ô nhiễm hiện tại để bảo vệ thiên nhiên cho thế hệ sau.
data.en_hint: We need to change our current polluting lifestyle to protect the natural legacies for the future generation.
data.content_game_1: We need to change our current polluting lifestyle to protect the natural legacies for the future generation.
data.answer_en_hint: We need to change our current polluting lifestyle to protect the natural legacies for the future generation.

data.trans: Làm mất cân bằng hệ sinh thái
data.trans_hint: Con người đang can thiệp quá thô bạo vào các quá trình tự nhiên, điều này có thể làm mất cân bằng hệ sinh thái.
data.en_hint: Human are intervening too harshly in natural processes, which may unbalance the ecosystem.
data.content_game_1: Human are intervening too harshly in natural processes, which may unbalance the ecosystem.
data.answer_en_hint: Human are intervening too harshly in natural processes, which may unbalance the ecosystem.

data.trans: Trở nên không thích hợp để làm gì
data.trans_hint: Nếu chúng ta tiếp tục làm ô nhiễm Mẹ thiên nhiên, nó sẽ sớm trở nên không thích hợp để sinh sống nữa.
data.en_hint: If we keep on polluting our Mother Nature, soon it will become unfit to live on.
data.content_game_1: If we keep on polluting our Mother Nature, soon it will become unfit to live on.
data.answer_en_hint: If we keep on polluting our Mother Nature, soon it will become unfit to live on.

data.trans_hint: Trái đất dần trở nên nóng hơn bao giờ hết dẫn đến sự tuyệt chủng của nhiều loài.
data.en_hint: The Earth has become warmer than ever, which has led to the extinction of many species.
data.content_game_1: The Earth has become warmer than ever, which has led to the extinction of many species.
data.answer_en_hint: The Earth has become warmer than ever, which has led to the extinction of many species.

data.trans: Sau khi ai đó rời đi
data.trans_hint: Để bảo vệ môi trường xung quanh, chúng ta không nên bỏ rác lại khi chúng ta rời đi.
data.en_hint: To protect the surroundings and our environment, we should leave no trash behind in our wake.
data.content_game_1: To protect the surroundings and our environment, we should leave no trash behind in our wake.
data.answer_en_hint: To protect the surroundings and our environment, we should leave no trash behind in our wake.

data.trans: Một thói quen có tính phá hủy
data.trans_hint: Xả rác là một thói quen có tính phá hủy và tất cả chúng ta nên cố gắng loại bỏ thói quen đó.
data.en_hint: Littering is a very destructive habit that we all should try to break.
data.content_game_1: Littering is a very destructive habit that we all should try to break.
data.answer_en_hint: Littering is a very destructive habit that we all should try to break.

data.trans_hint: Hãy giữ lấy hy vọng rằng chúng ta sẽ sớm tìm ra giải pháp cho các vấn đề về rác thải nhựa.
data.en_hint: Let's hold out some hope that we will soon find a way to solve the plastic waste problems.
data.content_game_1: Let's hold out some hope that we will soon find a way to solve the plastic waste problems.
data.answer_en_hint: Let's hold out some hope that we will soon find a way to solve the plastic waste problems.
